attributes.action: Resign his post and call a general election following the non-UN-backed invasion of Iraq, the resulting cover up of the flawed intellegence, the disregard for over 1 million people protesting against the war, the lack of a referendum on the war, the banning of protests in Parliament Square, and the ever growing movement towards a police state.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
